WorkItem.ClosedComment: Ok, that's Different, I though you were saying it was putting the Staff in the OH.THIS is intended functionality, so you can accurately compare 1h/OH vs 2H. the OH stats will be grayed out with a 2h equipped.
WorkItem.Description: This 2H comes up as a 1H when used in the optimizer, which suggest to use this staff with an offhand. can this be fixed or manually overwritten by myself?

Comments.Message: Refresh the Item data from wowhead, if it still doesn't come up as a 2h then edit the item manually to be one.
refreshing data from either wowhead or armoury does not work, so i'll try the manual option, tyvm
when i manually try to change it , it already says it is a 2H, saved it like that, but with the next optimization it still lists it with an OH attached to it
